physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Constitutional: NAD (No Acute Distress). Neuro: Alert and oriented x 3. Cardiac: RRR (Regular Rate and Rhythm), NL (Normal) S1, S2. Lungs: CTA (Clear to Auscultation) B (bilaterally). Abdomen: Softly distended, appropriately tender to palpation, no rebound tenderness/guarding. Wounds: Abd lap sites with primary dressing, CDI (Clean, Dry, and Intact). Extremities: No edema.
